content:
Unfortunately, not all of the citizens were within the kingdom during Rosalina's cleansing, and some had been left behind, still consumed by their ravenous addiction. These lost souls roamed the countryside, spreading the horrors of their addiction to any who crossed their path.

They became known as the "Hunters," feared by all who knew of their existence. They preyed upon the weak, devouring them in their insatiable hunger, leaving nothing but destruction and horror in their wake.

Despite their dangerous reputation, a small group of brave adventurers set out to find the Hunters and put an end to their reign of terror. They knew that it was a dangerous task, but they felt that it was their duty to protect the innocent and restore peace to the land.

Their journey was long and arduous, and they encountered many challenges along the way. But they pressed on, driven by their sense of purpose and their unwavering determination.

Finally, after many months of searching, the adventurers confronted the Hunters and engaged them in a fierce battle. The outcome of the battle was uncertain, but the adventurers were determined to succeed, for the sake of the kingdom and for all those who had fallen victim to the Hunters' insatiable hunger.

In the end, the Hunters were defeated, and peace was restored to the kingdom. The adventurers were hailed as heroes, and their bravery and determination were celebrated for generations to come. They had put an end to the horrors of addiction, and the kingdom was forever grateful for their bravery and selflessness.
